attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council tax is an absoulute disgrace. It goes up and up every year, but the services all around the country are drying up (Never any police, streets are filthy, less bin collections..)

We pay FAR TO MUCH tax in this country as it is, so we can subsidise the immigrants and the lazy.

Enough is enough.

rejection.details: The request to scrap council tax is fine but tour statement on subsidising immigrants is misleading and unsubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
